docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., Dec. 28 -- In many places throughout the world in 1952 the pattern of life was changed in many ways for many people because of the welfare programs that make up a large part of the activities of the United Nations Economic and Social Council.

headline.main: Welfare Work of U.N. Alters Life Pattern in Many Lands; U.N. WELFARE WORK HAS GLOBAL IMPACT

docs.abstract: ECOSOC and agency achievements revd; budget setup described; illus
